death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第二代最高领导人，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The second-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China and the chief architect of Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的父亲。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's father.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的母亲。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's mother.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的第一任妻子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的第二任妻子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的第三任妻子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的长子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的长女。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's eldest daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次女。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的三女。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's third daughter.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的次子。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's second son.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一代最高领导人。
description.en: The first-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A former major leader of the CCP and PRC, once served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东指定的接班人，曾任中共中央主席、国务院总理。
description.en: Mao Zedong's designated successor, who served as Chairman of the CCP Central Committee and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和总书记。
description.en: Former Chairman and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理和中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第三代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: The core of the third generation of CCP central leadership.

description.zh-cn: 指王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元四人在“文化大革命”期间所形成的政治集团。
description.en: A political faction composed of Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，文化大革命期间被定为毛泽东的接班人，后因九一三事件身亡。
description.en: Marshal of the PRC, designated as Mao Zedong's successor during the Cultural Revolution, died in the September 13 incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，与邓小平在战争时期长期搭档。
description.en: Marshal of the PRC, a long-term partner of Deng Xiaoping during the war period.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在粉碎四人帮事件中起了决定性作用。
description.en: Marshal of the PRC, played a decisive role in the smashing of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家。
description.en: A country in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，对中国社会造成了巨大破坏。
description.en: A political movement launched and led by Mao Zedong, which caused immense damage to Chinese society.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平主导的经济改革和社会开放政策。
description.en: The economic reform and social opening policy led by Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的学生示威及随后的清场行动。
description.en: Student-led demonstrations in Beijing's Tiananmen Square in 1989, followed by a military crackdown.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 为中共元老设立的过渡性机构。
description.en: A transitional body for veteran CCP leaders.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军事工作机关。
description.en: The military operations organ of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发起的反对资产阶级右派的政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign against bourgeois rightists launched in mainland China in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 旨在利用国家庞大的人力资源，以农业和工业的平行增长，迅速将国家从一个以农业为主的经济体转型成为一个现代化的共产主义社会。
description.en: A movement aimed at rapidly transforming China from an agrarian economy into a modern communist society through parallel growth in agriculture and industry, utilizing its vast human resources.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平退休后视察中国南方，发表了一系列推动改革开放的讲话。
description.en: After retirement, Deng Xiaoping inspected southern China and delivered a series of speeches to promote reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 由邓小平提出的经济体制模式，旨在在社会主义制度下发展市场经济。
description.en: An economic system model proposed by Deng Xiaoping, aiming to develop a market economy under the socialist system.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国进入改革开放新时期的重要会议，邓小平在此次会议上确立了领导核心地位。
description.en: A significant meeting that marked China's entry into the new era of reform and opening-up, where Deng Xiaoping established his core leadership position.

description.zh-cn: 指纠正文化大革命期间的“左”倾错误的思想、政治、组织路线。
description.en: Refers to the correction of the 'leftist' errors in ideology, politics, and organization during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平为解决香港、澳门及台湾问题提出的构想。
description.en: A concept proposed by Deng Xiaoping to resolve the issues of Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 旨在反对被认为是崇拜西方资本主义国家“民主”、“自由”，否定社会主义的政治思潮的运动。
description.en: A movement aimed at opposing political trends considered to worship the 'democracy' and 'freedom' of Western capitalist countries and negate socialism.

description.zh-cn: 苏联为中国革命培养干部的学校。
description.en: A Soviet school for training cadres for the Chinese revolution.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十八集团军第129师

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军第129师

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期八路军的主力部队之一，由刘伯承任师长，邓小平任政委。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Eighth Route Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War, with Liu Bocheng as commander and Deng Xiaoping as political commissar.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与英国就香港问题共同发表的声明。
description.en: A joint declaration by the People's Republic of China and the United Kingdom on the question of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 英国前首相，曾与邓小平就香港前途问题进行谈判。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, who negotiated with Deng Xiaoping on the future of Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 对建国以来中共若干重大历史问题作出官方结论的文件，对毛泽东的功过进行了评价。
description.en: A document that provided the official conclusion on several major historical issues of the CCP since the founding of the PRC, evaluating Mao Zedong's merits and demerits.

description.zh-cn: 两人在抗日战争和国共内战中长期搭档，共同领导的部队被称为“刘邓大军”。
description.en: The two were long-term partners during the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War, and the troops they commanded were known as the 'Liu-Deng Army'.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第十八集团军第129师

position.en: Director of Political Training Department / Political Commissar

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在法国勤工俭学时与周恩来相识并结下深厚友谊，回国后长期在周恩来领导下工作，并在周恩来的支持下于文革中复出。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping met Zhou Enlai during his work-study program in France and formed a deep friendship. After returning to China, he worked under Zhou's leadership for a long time and made a comeback during the Cultural Revolution with Zhou's support.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在文化大革命期间被作为“党内第二号走资派”打倒，被撤销一切职务并下放江西劳动。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was overthrown as the 'No. 2 capitalist roader in the Party' during the Cultural Revolution, stripped of all his posts, and sent to Jiangxi for labor.

description.zh-cn: 四人帮在文革期间是批斗邓小平的主要政治力量，并在1976年发动“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动，导致邓小平第三次下台。
description.en: The Gang of Four was the main political force criticizing Deng Xiaoping during the Cultural Revolution and launched the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversal Trend' campaign in 1976, leading to Deng's third downfall.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平被官方评价为“改革开放的总设计师”。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping is officially acclaimed as the 'Chief Architect of Reform and Opening-up'.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在该次会议上确立了领导核心的地位，取代华国锋成为实际上的最高领导人。
description.en: At this meeting, Deng Xiaoping established his status as the core of the leadership, replacing Hua Guofeng as the de facto paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平通过批评“两个凡是”和推动改革开放，取代了华国锋的最高领导人地位。
description.en: By criticizing the 'Two Whatevers' and promoting reform and opening-up, Deng Xiaoping replaced Hua Guofeng as the paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平提出“一国两制”构想以解决香港、澳门及台湾问题。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping proposed the 'One Country, Two Systems' concept to resolve the issues of Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 由于邓小平认为胡耀邦反对“资产阶级自由化”不力，胡耀邦被迫辞去中共中央总书记职务。
description.en: Because Deng Xiaoping believed Hu Yaobang was ineffective in opposing 'bourgeois liberalization', Hu was forced to resign as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 由于赵紫阳在六四事件中同情学生，被邓小平罢免了所有职务。
description.en: Because Zhao Ziyang sympathized with the students during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he was dismissed from all his posts by Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，邓小平批准了对天安门广场的清场行动，镇压了学生运动。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Deng Xiaoping approved the clearing of Tiananmen Square, suppressing the student movement.

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后，邓小平选择江泽民作为赵紫阳的继任者，成为新的中共中央总书记。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, Deng Xiaoping chose Jiang Zemin as Zhao Ziyang's successor, making him the new General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平的南巡讲话重新推动了在六四事件后停滞的改革开放进程。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's southern tour speeches reinvigorated the process of reform and opening-up, which had stagnated after the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在南巡讲话中明确提出“社会主义也有市场”的观点，为社会主义市场经济体制的建立奠定了理论基础。
description.en: In his southern tour speeches, Deng Xiaoping explicitly stated the view that 'socialism also has a market', laying the theoretical foundation for the establishment of the socialist market economy system.

description.zh-cn: 就香港前途问题进行谈判。
description.en: Negotiated on the future of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 首次正式提出“一个国家，两种制度”的概念，并将其应用于香港问题的解决。
description.en: First formally proposed the concept of 'One Country, Two Systems' and applied it to the resolution of the Hong Kong issue.

relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 邓小平主持了该决议的起草工作，对毛泽东的功过作出了“三七开”的评价。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping presided over the drafting of this resolution, which evaluated Mao Zedong's merits and demerits as '70% good, 30% bad'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
中国共产党中央顾问委员会
中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 担任中共中央反右领导小组组长，主持并积极推进反右运动。
description.en: Served as the head of the CCP Central Anti-Rightist Leading Group, presiding over and actively promoting the Anti-Rightist Campaign.
